com.percussion.design.objectstore
Class PSComponent

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSComponent, Serializable, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSDataSet, PSDisplayText, PSEntry, PSField, com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNamedReplacementValue, PSRelationship, PSRelationshipConfig
public abstract class PSComponent
extends Object
implements IPSComponent, Serializable

The PSComponent class implements some of the IPSComponent interface as a convenience to objects extending this class. When subclassing, make sure to override copyFrom().

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tas Giakouminakis
See Also:
Serialized Form

copyFrom

public void copyFrom(PSComponent c)
Performs a shallow copy of the data in the supplied component to this component. Derived classes should implement this method for their data, calling the base class method first.

Parameters:
c - a valid PSComponent. Cannot be null.

setFeatureSet

public static void setFeatureSet(com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSFeatureSet fs)
This method is present to improve our backwards compatibility support. The user of the objectstore should check if the connected server is an older version than the version of this client software. If it is, the featureset from the server should be set using this method before any objectstore classes are used. To prevent garbage collection, a reference to an instance of this class or the class object should be kept for the duration of use.

Derived classes will use this information to support writing app data to servers in different formats. This will allow us to maintain backwards compatibility for a longer period of time.

Parameters:
fs - If null, returns immediately. The feature set obtained from the connected server.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - If called more than once.

isFeatureSupported

protected static boolean isFeatureSupported(String featureName,
                                            int minVersion)
This method checks if the requested version is present in the feature set. If no feature set has been set, this method will always return true. This provides a default behavior of writing data in the newest format.

Parameters:
featureName - The name of the feature as found in the featureset.xml file. Never null or empty. Name is case-insensitive.
minVersion - The minimum version of the feature to check for.
Returns:
true if the feature is found in the feature set with a version greater than or equal the requested version or no feature set has been set, false otherwise.

updateParentList

protected ArrayList updateParentList(ArrayList parentComponents)
Add this to the list of parent objects in the array list.

After a call to this method, the caller should keep get the size of the arraylist so that a call to resetParentList can be made (with size - 1) to allow for proper reset.

Parameters:
parentComponents - the parent list
Returns:
the new parent list (in case parentComponents was null)

resetParentList

protected void resetParentList(ArrayList parentComponents,
                               int size)
Reset the list of parent objects in the array list to the specified size.

Parameters:
parentComponents - the parent list
size - the size to set the list to

protected static boolean compare(Object a,
                                 Object b)
Safely compares two objects for equality when those objects might be null or Arrays.

Returns:
true if both objects are null, or if both objects are equal; false otherwise.

validate

public void validate(com.percussion.design.objectstore.IPSValidationContext cxt)
              throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSValidationException
Description copied from interface: IPSComponent
Validates this object within the given validation context. The method signature declares that it throws PSValidationException, but the implementation must not directly throw any exceptions. Instead, it should register any errors with the validation context, which will decide whether to throw the exception (in which case the implementation of validate should not catch it unless it is to be rethrown).

Specified by:
validate in interface IPSComponent
Parameters:
cxt - The validation context.
Throws:
PSValidationException - According to the implementation of the validation context (on warnings and/or errors).

Parameters:
converters - The converters to set, may be null or empty to clear the current list.

getComponentConverters

public static List<com.percussion.design.objectstore.legacy.IPSComponentConverter> getComponentConverters()
Get a copy of the current list of converters. See setComponentConverters(List).

Returns:
The list, never null, may be empty. Changes to the returned list are not reflected in this object.

getComponentConverter

public static com.percussion.design.objectstore.legacy.IPSComponentConverter getComponentConverter(Class clazz)
Convenience method that returns the first converter for which IPSComponentConverter.canConvertComponent(Class) returns true. See setComponentConverters(List).

Parameters:
clazz - The class to test, may not be null.
Returns:
The converter, or null if none matched.

validateElementName

protected static void validateElementName(Element elem,
                                          String expectedName)
                                   throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Validates that elem is not null and has the expected name.

Parameters:
elem - Element to be validated
expectedName - the name you are expecting elem to have; cannot be null
Throws:
PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if elem is null , or has a name other than the expected name.

getImpliedAttribute

protected static String getImpliedAttribute(PSXmlTreeWalker tree,
                                            String attrName)
Gets the element data from an #IMPLIED attribute. If the data is null it will return null.

This was added to accomodate the replacewith node that's used for control deprecation.

Parameters:
tree - a valid PSXmlTreeWalker currently positioned at the element that should contain the specified attribute.
attrName - the name of the attribute to retrieve data from not null or empty.
Returns:
a value for the specified attribute, may return null

getEnumeratedAttribute

protected static String getEnumeratedAttribute(PSXmlTreeWalker tree,
                                               String attrName,
                                               String[] legalValues)
                                        throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Convenience method that calls getEnumeratedAttribute(tree, attrName, legalValues, false).

Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException

getEnumeratedAttribute

protected static String getEnumeratedAttribute(PSXmlTreeWalker tree,
                                               String attrName,
                                               String[] legalValues,
                                               boolean ignoreCase)
                                        throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Gets the element data from an attribute and validates that the data is a legal value. If the data is null or empty, it will be set with a default value (assumed to be the value at index 0 of the legal value array).

Parameters:
tree - a valid PSXmlTreeWalker currently positioned at the element that should contain the specified attribute.
attrName - the name of the attribute to retrieve data from; not null
legalValues - the array of permitted values, with a default value at index 0.
Returns:
a legal value for the specified attribute, never null or empty.
Throws:
PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the node has an illegal value.

getRequiredElement

protected static String getRequiredElement(PSXmlTreeWalker tree,
                                           String elemName,
                                           boolean fromRoot)
                                    throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Gets the element data from a required attribute or child element. It is an error for a required node to be absent or empty.

Parameters:
tree - a valid PSXmlTreeWalker currently positioned at the element that is the parent of the required node, not null.
elemName - the name of the node to retrieve data from, not null.
fromRoot - true to start the search from the root element, false to start from the current element in the tree.
Returns:
a String containing the element data from the specified node, never null or empty.
Throws:
PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the specified node is missing or empty.

getRequiredElement

protected static String getRequiredElement(PSXmlTreeWalker tree,
                                           String elemName)
                                    throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Same as getRequiredElement(PSXmlTreeWalker, String, boolean) starting the search always from the root.

Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException

clone

public Object clone()
Description copied from interface: IPSComponent
Creates a new instance of this object, deep copying all member variables. If an implementing class has mutable member variables, it must override this method and clone() each of those variables. This method will create a shallow copy if it is not overridden.

NOTE: Currently, this method has been overridden only in a subset of the classes that require it. Only those classes recursively aggregated by PSDisplayMapper are correct.

Specified by:
clone in interface IPSComponent
Overrides:
clone in class Object
Returns:
a deep-copy clone of this instance, never null.

public int hashCode()
Overrides:
hashCode in class Object

fromXml

protected void fromXml(Element source)
                throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Extracts the data for this class from the supplied element. If not present, an exception is thrown. All base classes should call this method while performing their fromXml.

See toXml(Element) for the dtd.

Parameters:
source - Never null.
Throws:
PSUnknownNodeTypeException - If the data for this class is not found in the supplied node.

toXml

protected Element toXml(Element source)
Adds the data for this class to the supplied element as attributes. All base classes should call this method while performing their toXml.

Conforms to the following dtd: 

 <!ELEMENT sourceName ...>
 <!ATTLIST sourceName
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
    >
